plugin._field_explanation: Split-screen throttle settings should be more aggressive than non-local co-op settings block index 0: default non split screen block index 1: two way split screen block index 2: three way split screen block index 3: four way split screen block index 4: one additional non-local player block index 5: two additional non-local players block index 6: three additional non-local players

item.Name: disable first person depth of field
disable instance occlusion queries#WARNING Will likely hurt perf on most maps

_field_real.name: effect lod distance scale{effect lod limit}
object fade modifier#scales down the distances at which objects first LOD and then fade out
object lighting time limit:s 0=0.001s#per frame time limit to spend sampling new lighting radiosity
LOD modifier{IO fade modifier}:[0..1]#scales the distances for LOD
LOD vertical modifier{IO fade vertical modifier}:[0..1]#scales vertical LOD calculations (flying)

_field_long_integer.name: Maximum Instance Group LOD draw bundles:[0..16]#Increases LOD on instances to reduce total number of draw bundles used to render groups
max forward dynamic lights{max gpu dynamic lights}#will quickly fade gpu lights when we try to render more than this many:0 = off

_field_real.name: forward dynamic light fade distance scale{gpu light fade distance scale}#scales the size used for distance-fade (set smaller to make it fade earlier)

_field_long_integer.name: max screenspace dynamic lights#will quickly fade screenspace lights when we try to render more than this many:0 = off

_field_real.name: screenspace light fade distance scale#scales the size used for distance-fade (set smaller to make it fade earlier)

_field_long_integer.name: max effect lights (screenspace)#limits the number of effect lights we allow to be active at a time (eg. needler needles lighting up objects):0 = off

_field_real.name: shadow quality lod#scales resolution of object shadows:[0.0 to 1.0]
floating shadow quality lod#scales resolution of floating shadow:[0.0 to 1.0], 0 = off
